Welcome to the NOC Project!

NOC Project is an Operation Support System (OSS) for telecom companies, service providers, and enterprise Network Operation Centers (NOC). Areas covered by NOC include:
  • service activation/provisioning
  • multi-VRF address space management (IPAM)
  • multi-vendor configuration management
  • fault management
  • performance management
  • VC management
  • DNS provisioning
  • knowledge base
  • peering management
  • RPSL and BGP filter generation
  • and reporting.
NOC is open source and released under the terms of BSD LICENSE

Getting started

  • Official site
  • Online documentation
  • IRC: #nocproject.org at irc.freenode.net
  • NOC at linkedin.com
